title: IN PICTURES: Iftar at Independence Square
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Many who participated in protests today (08) were also seen breaking fast at the Independence square in solidarity.
Photo Credits: @NuzlyMN and @JeromeRasiah on twitter and @anjalee.w on Instagram, among other contributors
